body:
Comment 3: 
Are you able to produce a change list and mail it to golang-dev? See the contribution
guidelines for details:
    http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html

You could also include a test case (probably as a sample program in $GOROOT/test).

Your help with this is much appreciated! If you need any assistance, contact me at
adg@golang.org.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
